evidence_assessment: factual bases disclosed in the NOA
application_details: Applicants argue that 18 items in the Lenz Affidavit exceed the NOA's scope
decision_reasoning: many impugned parts relate to or confirm opinions already in the NOA
striking them would delay proceedings unnecessarily
result_of_case: impugned evidence remains admissible for now
procedure_steps: Applicants moved to strike parts of an affidavit
court reviewed relevant jurisprudence and the specifics of the impugned evidence
